data.name: ItLivesInTheWoods
data.detailed_description:
NOTE: The game focuses on exploration and builds tension slowly to create a deeper and more meaningful experience. Its story is unveiled through surreal imaging and subtle environment details. Furthermore, additional information and pictures/trailers will be released nearer to launch date which (was originally late April, but due to my studies, I had to postpone game development as I am the sole developer of this game) is early August 2022.



presents...

How far will you go to reunite with your lost daughter?

ItLivesInTheWoods is a first-person psychological horror game set in Canada in modern times.

Plot


You will experience a linear story, full of mystery and twists.

Everything was well before your daughter, Sarah, mysteriously disappeared in the forest during a hiking trip a week ago. You don't know what happened to your daughter or if she is still alive. You only know you want her back safely in your arms again. However, you've been searching day and night but to no avail.



The deeper you go into the forest, the more you will question what is real and what is not.

Environment


You will explore a rich procedurally generated forest (every player will experience the same level design. However, the forest was designed procedurally during development), where the more you explore, the more you will unearth the reality of your daughter. However, in doing so will also introduce you to certain evil, of which you must overcome to reunite with your daughter. Some things you encounter will seem surreal, and may actually be so.

Can you trust your eyes?

Gameplay


You will uncover puzzles and cues of which you must complete to understand your surroundings and progress in the game. Nearly every object in the game is inspectable and/or interactable, where some will enrich the story with new information or backstory, and some will simulate the environment for realism. You only have basic camping gear (i.e. flashlight).

Perhaps you will be hunted by an evil, which will test your survival skills until either you are defeated or it.

data.short_description: ItLivesInTheWoods is a first-person psychological horror set in the forests of Canada. You are Ibrahim, a father who has recently lost his daughter whilst on a hiking trip in the forest last winter. You hope to find what happened to your daughter and whether you can reunite with her.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-4160 or AMD Phenom II X4 955 64-bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 660 or AMD Radeon™ R9 200x with 4GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Full HD 1920x1080 Resolution
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 10.15 Catalina
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB video ram
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
